website_summaries.verdict: This ridiculously popular mattress protector is a must-have for health conscious consumers and those suffering from severe allergies.
pros: Completely waterproof, protecting against spills and urine
Designed as a fitted sheet to easily take on and off
Customers appreciate the silence of the fabric
cons: Does not zip around the entire mattress

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't urine-proof
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old's bed. She's potty trained, but still occasionally wets the bed. I chose this waterproof mattress pad based on the number of reviews and the high overall rating. But, based on my experience, this mattress pad did not keep the urine from leaking through onto the new mattress (which now has a urine stain/smell). Going to try another mattress pad that claims to be water-proof, hopefully one of these works.
customer_reviews.author: P G

customer_reviews.title: DISINTEGRATED. MATTRESS RUINED.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work great for two years, but you don't really know until it's tested. My cat got locked in the room and peed on the bed. Changed the sheets and discovered that the water proof layer of the cover disintegrated where the pee was, and only where the pee was, ruining my thousand dollar latex foam mattress. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Makes Crinkling Noise with Every Move, Thin and Material not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. This is marketed as "Noiseless". This was not true. First, the material is thin and not cushiony at all. I guess it might serve a "waterproof" purpose I dont know. The material is like a waterproof material. It is noisy with every move on it and not comfortable under your sheet. It is quite expensive for the quality you get
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Boy Was I Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: After I read the reviews I went ahead and purchased the mattress protector because the price was right, most of the reviews were positive, and I was purchasing for my personal bed so I only needed minimal to moderate waterproof protection, BUT BOY WAS I SURPRISED when only 3 months after purchasing my son was sick and slept in my bed. After fluid being released from every orfice the protector WAS WATERPROOF! I followed all of the directions, everything cleaned up and off, no leakage, and here it is back on the bed in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Tierra

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want your mattress protected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect a brand new mattress. When I took it off today to wash it, my mattress was stained. I needed this to protect it because of the mattress warranty. The wrong mattress was sent and now they won’t take it back because of the stains. This cover was never off of it. I am stuck with a $500 mattress I hate because of this cheap cover. It’s so thin. The top is some type of thin, cheap terry. The bottom side reminds me of what they put on baby cribs back in the 70’s. This is the worst mattress pad I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After doing thorough research on what bed protector to buy I finally settled on this one, it had excellent reviews and everyone seemed to love it. I had it for about 2 months with no issue and I had a small child sleeping in my bed and I didn't think it was going to be a problem with the mattress protector. BOY WAS I WRONG. The child had an accident and it went through all the way down the mattress and left a huge stain. The mattress wasn't more than 6 months old either. Needless to say I'm not happy with the product. If customer service would contact me that would be great I'd love to talk to them.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Not for adult use!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s a bit of a squirter, if you know what I mean. So we bought this to protect our brand new mattress. After two weeks we decided to wash the sheets, only to find our mattress looked like it had gone through 1945 Berlin. It was horrible, this product did nothing to protect the mattress, save an extra layer of cloth to be soaked. 10/10 would not recommend, very bad investment. Terrible product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW. Durable. Keeps mattress brand new.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I bought this months ago & came back to write a review. In the middle of washing my sheets there was an accident with some pink sunny D. I have yet to wash it yet but I cannot believe it did not sleep through to the bed one bit! Not even on the edge. So thankful I bought this now. It’s a one time purchase that will save you a hassle in the long run. Especially when you have a memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: shidanhug

customer_reviews.title: Item does not breathe as stated. I started to ...
customer_reviews.text: Item does not breathe as stated. I started to sweat within 5 minutes of lying down and had to take it off immediately. There was a constant noise while I moved which is contrary to what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: It's OK and better than the two other products I tried
customer_reviews.text: It's OK and better than the two other products I tried. It does affect the feel of my memory foam bed a little and it does increase the heat some, too. Also, it is not entirely crinkle-free. But unlike the bamboo protector I tried, I didn't burn up with this. It is nice and thin. Based on what others have said, it sounds like it will protect the bed, so I will keep it. Don't know if I'll be able to tolerate it in the summer, however. UPDATE: Last week I accidentally spilled hot tea on my bed. The protector worked well, keeping the liquid off my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Razz51

customer_reviews.title: Used many years and continue to come back for this superior mattress protector!
customer_reviews.text: I am a long-term buyer of this product. I have a special needs son who is diaper dependent and so leaks happen during the night through his diaper and onto his night and bedclothes. Thank goodness for this mattress protector! In the years that I have been buying/using these mattress protectors, we have not had any experiences of his mattress getting dirty or wer. I would gladly pay more for this protector as it has saved my son’s mattress many countless of times. I am happy that the price is as low as it is, please don’t let the price fool you...this protector is far superior than some others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Have just now had the occasion to use this. What a joke. Definitely not liquid proof. My husband has become incontinent and this was supposed to be wonderful from all the reviews. Not only was it not waterproof, but the mattress was wet. So now I'm not only out the money for this garbage, but the mattress needs cleaning. Don't understand all the good reviews on this thing. Definitely not worth a purchase. I now need to look elsewhere for something that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress protector!
customer_reviews.text: Nice protector! Does just what I needed. Deep pockets for the thicker mattresses, and it stays on well. I really like this product. Reasonably priced, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t understand what the fuss is about these things! They are not waterproof at all! When my kids pee in bed, it leaks all the time even though I followed the instructions for cleaning and care to the T. A bad product! Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Brazilian mommy

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all :-(
customer_reviews.text: This is really quite a waste of money. One of our kids peed in our bed and it went right through. Quite the disappointment, going to buy a different one with a diamond quilted top that works amazingly well on our kids bed instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jav

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress protector about a year now and it has gone through the wash a decent amount of times. I've been sick recently and had an accident in my sleep tonight (#2). Basically had to throw all my bedding out. This mattress protector stopped everything in its tracks and prevented anything from going through. Threw it out and just ordered another. Well worth the $35. Also, it doesn't sound plasticy and doesn't make you sweat like some other waterproof mattress protectors. Only gripe is that it sheds some white fibers the few couple washes so may want to wash it alone the first 5-10 times, or with towels to help it dry quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Over time, no longer waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These definitely degrade over time. I have washed them per manufacturer instructions and after less than a year of use they are no longer waterproof. My kid wets the bed and the pee just soaks right through to the mattress. They worked great at first but just don't hold up. My detergent is mild, heat is low, I do everything I can to treat them gently. Honestly they are pretty useless at this point but I have yet to find a mattress pad that is truly pee-proof.
customer_reviews.author: Duh Slacks

customer_reviews.title: Unlike  other waterproof mattress covers used in the past. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The past mattress covers have been noisy and easily tore. Read multiple reviews about being a problem meeting California guidelines for cancer risk. Very glad I found this mattress cover that seems like putting a big towel over the bed with the waterproof backing. NOT noisy to lay on. The skirt that goes around and under the mattress is very generous and gives a snug fit. Wish I would have found this sooner. Don't know how waterproof it is, as I haven't poured any liquids on it, but am very pleased with the quality of the construction and very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Goldfish Fan

customer_reviews.title: Bought because of good reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those people that will review the heck out of something before I make the purchase. I do t his in an effort to get the BEST product for the money. Well, unfortunately this time, it did NOT work out for me and my family. We purchased this mattress cover in order to protect our new expensive mattress, as we knew our young daughter would be sleeping with us for a little while. Not only did it not work, but when she wet the bed, it went right thru the mattress protector into the mattress. So now I have a King sized, expensive mattress with a giant pee stain...
customer_reviews.author: Neal Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not loud at all
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering after reading reviews, but in order to comply with the warranty on my new nectar mattress I needed a cover over it. So I ordered it. I’m not sure why others are complaining about the noise from it. I didn’t notice much of a difference. You are putting something on your bed that is waterproof, obviously it’s not going to be completely silent. But it is not loud at all. We don’t even notice it. As far as it being waterproof, I have not tried that out. But ignore the reviews about it being loud.
customer_reviews.author: Mikala F.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It fits the mattress well and isn't high maintenance to clean. However, it is NOT waterproof, as my 4 and 6-year-olds have proven. They both still have nighttime accidents occasionally, and not only leak through their pull-ups, but through the mattress protector as well. I purchased this and twin size protectors with the intent that they would protect my mattresses. They have not lived up to their marketing promises. I have followed cleaning instructions and have not responded them to bleach or high temp drying. So just know that if you have bed wetters, you'll need something in addition to this, sheets, and pull ups...
customer_reviews.author: HA

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old that is patty training and we need it sometime for bed time accidents. This product does NOT work at all!!!!! My daughter had two accidents and her mattress is ruined . Every little drop when directed to the mattress, this thing did not help at all.... really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ysey80

customer_reviews.title: Came stained straight out of packaging. Gross!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to have an extra on hand. It looked perfect in the packaging but when removed and added to bed, you can clearly see stains. Was this a returned item with amazing repackaging skills or was this done in the factory. We did not catch this in time, so don't be like us. Open your package right away to make sure it wasn't stained. This thing is gross. Looks like blood. First time we have ever experienced the used for new switcheroo. Total bummer. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: H.J.Feltz

customer_reviews.title: Better than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this because my cat "used" my bed while I was away on vacation, and I don't want to spend hours cleaning my mattress again. It doesn't have that annoying "crinkle" noise most mattress toppers do, nor do I sweat quite as much as others have historically caused me to. I haven't had a chance to see how it does protecting from my cat (and hopefully I never will!), but it fits and isn't as uncomfortable as it could be. Edit: Cat got stuck inside because of weather and couldn’t hold it, but this sheet protector could! My mattress pad was totally dry!
customer_reviews.author: Ixtaek

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: I'm having to replace it after just over a year - it's certainly not "noiseless," but we were fine with that as long as it lived up to being "waterproof" and "durable." It is neither. Don't waste your time. We should've replaced this about six months ago, to be honest. We waited until the holiday season to replace it, hoping to score a sale. As an aside, I'd seriously question the thirty-two thousand or so reviews for this product, given the poor quality and largely baseless marketing claims. I honestly wish Amazon wouldn't enable this kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Who knew you had to change your mattress cover?
customer_reviews.text: Here is a little tip for those that might not have known this little fact, apparently sleeping on the same mattress cover for 5 years is disgusting. So I had to go on amazizzle and look for something. This one had a million good reviews so I risked it. The previous mattress cover installation looked like to sumos wrestling and the new one was a breeze. Its comfy and doesn't get hot at night. I say go for it and take the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older mattress protector, which was much more expensive. Before ordering, I was concerned that the lower price would mean it didn't really work; that it wasn't really leakproof. My concerns were unfounded. I woke up this morning and discovered the dog had been incontinent during the night. I got her cleaned up and made sure she knew she wasn't in trouble, and then I stripped the bed. The top of this mattress protector was wet, and the mattress underneath it was perfectly dry. I tossed the protector in the washer with the sheets, dried on low, and we were good to go again. I HIGHLY recommend this SafeRest mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: ptkdude

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like rubber sheets...
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! I had no idea these would sound like plastic/rubber sheets. I feel like I'm sleeping on a child's bed. I wanted this because the guy at the mattress store said that sweat is the number one thing that can deteriorate a mattress, but man I don't think I can stand the "plasticy" sound of this every time I move. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Don't know it's there
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd stumbled onto this product a long time ago. It fits easily on my mattress and gives me peace of mind about blocking transfer in both directions. As far as sleeping on it, I don't realize it's there. No crinkle, no increased heat, no waking up wet, which used to happen when I slept on my parents' guest bed with a plastic mattress protector. The terry surface has a really nice feel, and too bad that's hidden by my bottom sheet. It hasn't yet been subjected to the waterproof test yet, but I'm very happy with it and satisfied with other reviews and so am ordering a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat accidentally got locked in my daughters room overnight. He pooped on her floor and peed TWICE on her bed. Thanks to this protector, her bed was unscathed! I soaked the protector and sheets on an oxygen activator, then laundered them in detergent, baking soda and vinegar and it was like nothing had ever happened. I'm so surprised and impressed. The urine spots were huge and sopping wet, so I for sure thought the mattress was a goner. NOPE! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

customer_reviews.title: A three-peat
customer_reviews.text: My prior review still works. We bought a third as a back-up. This is the mattress cover I should have purchased the first time. Nothing but positive comments to share. It fit well, seems well made, has a nice soft texture, and most important of all, you cannot even tell that this cover is on the mattress. With the prior cover, our daughter did not like the hard feeling of a plastic bag under her sheets. This cover is completely the opposite of that. We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Gaston

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESNT WORK.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a BRAND NEW mattress. I couldn’t understand why my mattress was urine stained but figured maybe I left it off a few times while it was in the wash and I have two small children. Well the other night my 4 year old had an accident at night so I pulled it off and sure enough it had soaked through, it is USELESS. I wash it following the directions on the tag and it doesn’t work. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money it doesn't protect from spills or accidents
customer_reviews.text: This product does not protect your bed my bed is now ruined because I trusted this product to protect it... My daughter had an accident and it soaked thur all the way to the foam don't waste your money on this product... Update o contacted the company because now my mattress is now ruined I was told I couldn't do both get a replacement and send in the other one to tested so i could get the mattress repaired I have animals and do not want then on my bed without protection so I took the replacement I will have to get the mattress as clean as I can... I say do business with someone else....
customer_reviews.author: Dallasgrl

customer_reviews.title: As expected, works well, slightly big
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a backup for my 5 year old's bed. It works as expected and the mattress has been protected from two accidents. My only complaint is that it's not super snug on the mattress (full size) like our store brand version. You can't tell with a sheet on though, so it's fine. I keep pool noodles under the edge to keep my child from falling out and with this mattress protector they sometimes slip down over the edge, whereas they are held in place by our store brand mattress protector. Minor thing for an unconventional use, but might be worth mentioning if you plan to use this with small children and bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer_76

customer_reviews.title: Works great for pee accidents at night
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo has started going to bed in his undies and has accidents every now and then. This protector blocks liquid completely and it's topped with terry material so whatever the sheets don't soak up, it catches so there are no issues with urine going over the sides of the mattress as it's repelled by the waterproof layer. I like it so much I plan on getting another set for my 5yo and 2 sets each for my 4 and 2yo to have on their beds (so there's an extra to put on while I'm washing the soiled one in case of accidents).
customer_reviews.author: kaljcloTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Does not encase the mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems fine, but I didn't realize that "fitted sheet style" doesn't zip closed around the entire mattress. My mistake. But what is the point of protecting a mattress from dust mites if the dust mites can get into the mattress? I purchased this early for my son who's going off to college and only just opened the package to wash. Too late to return. Will have to search for a new one (and one that protects against bed bugs. Didn't realize that this one doesn't.)
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: great for a king size tempurpedic mattress
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great mattress cover. Our old one had a funky plastic layer to it that would make us warm at night, and then for some mysterious reason, it started flaking off onto the mattress. After researching mattress covers over a year ago, we bought these for the kids' twin beds. They have been great so we decided to treat ourselves to a new one for our mattress. It's been great. We haven't noticed a temperature difference and it stays on way better than the first. We have a tempurpedic king size mattress, this fits the corners perfectly, never comes off on its own, and doesn't lump up anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie and Chet

customer_reviews.title: Best out of 4 comparable brands!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattress protector, for so many reasons! It really is waterproof; unlike the cheaper ones I also own, this one protects the mattress 100% from liquid. It’s also not 1,000 lbs when you take it out of the washer (like the other brands I have) and it doesn’t take FOREVER to dry in the dryer (you guessed it, like the OTHER ONES)! Bought this one 7 months ago and buying a second one for good measure. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Caralee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not at all waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It is noiseless, soft, and washes well. The problem is that it is just a fancy fitted sheet. It is NOT waterproof at all. I have a double set of sheet and protectors (mattress protector, sheet, mattress protector,sheet) on my son’s bed. When he wets the bed, the urine leaks through all four layers. Luckily enough is absorbed by the time it reaches the second protector that the mattress hasn’t been ruined, but I’m replacing them before I find out for sure. I’m not sure what these five star reviewers are using this for, but it’s not to protect their mattress from kid pee!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO WASH
customer_reviews.text: An absolute piece of trash!!!!!! IMPOSSIBLE TO WASH. I have attempted to wash this THREE times and each time it is SOAKED in soap and water. Having a rubber side prevents any washing abilities. I had a small coffee spill while I was at work (about an oz or 2) . It sat for I'd guess 2 hours, and it offered zero protection and seeped right into my mattress. Zero rips or holes. I would NEVER purchase this again and have no idea what I'm missing with these positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jessyka

customer_reviews.title: True to its claims - Waterproof, Breathable, and Hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: I love this product that I am buying a second as a back-up. My toddler is potty training so he has accidents in bed. Sometimes there is a large area of urine and this mattress protector holds it all, never leaking through, preserving his mattress. He spilled a full cup of chocolate milk and also, not one drop went through. It washes and dries great (I have been washing it about twice a week for 2 months). No stains, no fraying, no shrinkage. It are breathable and my son doesn't get overheated or sweaty. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: a staple for any mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for two years. I waited before writing the review ti give a genuine feedback. I have it on my son's bed.When he was younger of course he used to wet his bed a lot! However, the mattress is always clean and protected. I wash this mattress protector in the washing machine following the instructions and it is still doing its job. I read that few people noticed difference in its performance after washing it, but I think they may not have followed the care instructions. From my experience, it is amazing and makes the mattress look new. I recommend it and I am going to buy another one for my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ahlam

customer_reviews.title: Do not skip this mattress cover!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This saved my mattress yesterday. I bought this about 6 months ago and have washed it a few times. My pup threw up in the bed - total MESS on the sheet, lifted up the mattress cover and NOTHING on the mattress. So happy I invested in this when I got a new bed. Sorry for the yellow stain in the video, but it really shows that it worked, and I want to share!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good!
customer_reviews.text: Terry cotton surface was one reason I chose this mattress protector. It keeps the bottom sheet from sliding around, it's breathable, it's not noisy. My husband tends to sleep warm, but he's been comfortable with this. It fits our 12" deep mattress without bagging around the sides. Per instructions, I washed on hot, dried on low. It came out fine. Can't speak to its longevity, as we've only had a little over a month. The 10-year warranty is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: 3Catzzz

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof. Urine leaks right through.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and well fitted, but not at all waterproof. I followed the directions for laundering but both protectors I bought have failed to keep urine off there mattress. My daughter occasionally has accidents, a few times a month, and this helps hold a bit of fluid in its absorbent layer but that’s it. Urine stains on the new mattress. Leaked every time. I am going to try and return them. Amazon probably won’t give me my money back without any packaging from the original product, but I’m going to box up my two useless covers and send them back. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: AHarper

customer_reviews.title: Not Breathable
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a white PLASTIC fitted sheet with a thin fabric layer adhered to it. Sleeping on plastic, well you know that's not going to be comfy and you'll get very sweaty I was excited to order this due to the high volume of positive reviews. Maybe if you put it on a child's bed and they don't complain, you'll never know -- I'm somewhat confused because it's advertised as: "SafeRest's waterproof membrane is free of vinyl, PVC, phthalates or fire retardant chemical treatments" I find that misleading, plastic is plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Frank M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Understand....
customer_reviews.text: All these positive reviews. This pad is not only loud when you move on it but it's slippery as well and I have a foam mattress. The last thing I want to feel while I'm trying to sleep is my fitted sheet moving when I move because the pad slips on top of the bed mattress. Returning for a better quality mattress protection
customer_reviews.author: KimberMcC

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 3rd wash (if you’re lucky)
customer_reviews.text: So; this product. There is no way around it. It leaks. It won’t necessarily leak after your first wash or the second. But for me ; with THREE of these (two for a king and one for a twin) - they all end up leaking. On the phone I got the 5th degree on what I could have done wrong before they replaced the first king sized one. I can assure you at this point. I did nothing wrong. I can’t air dry this product where I live. So I dry it on low. I wash it on cold. It doesn’t look ripped or like it should leak. But it absolutely provides NO protection. Buyer beware. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Plums and Daisies

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress protector and not noisy at all!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the mattress protector so far. Just nice to know there is something protecting the mattress if needed. It does not sound crinkly at all!!! If there is a noise, it reminds me a bit of wind pants, but it's not loud at all and actually after testing it out for the noise, my husband and I haven't even gave it another thought. I toss and turn a lot at night and it's not an issue for noise at all, and I'm a very light sleeper and noises bother me at night. Fit the bed perfect and we have a sleep number bed. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This product has failed after 1 year of use. I have always washed it according to the directions and I never even put it in the dryer at all. My son sleeps on it in a diaper due to occasional bedwetting. This mattress pad allowed urine that was just the amount that leaked out of his diaper to soak into his mattress, causing the mattress to now smell like urine. I am calling the warranty department tomorrow, but that will likely not help me with the mattress issue this product has caused. Extremely disappointed as I have these on all of our beds.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son peed straight through this leaving a soaked mattress underneath. I was so excited for this, but unfortunately it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: mc2cmt

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Did not live up to the promises or my expectations. We have followed the care instructions for this mattress protector to a tee and have had the mattress since 2014. However, up until just recently, we have never had the waterproofing put to the test...it failed miserably! Our cat was accidentally locked in the bedroom and peed on our bed...when I removed the sheets and mattress protector to wash, low and behold our VERY expensive mattress was covered in urine! It is also terrible to sleep on, as it quickly became covered in pilling. I am beyond annoyed and would NOT recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sharalanda

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, slips around, makes noise, hot
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor & buy one of the thick quilted ones. This is very thin, terry laminated to a plastic like substance. It is slippery, makes noise, makes you hot. I bought something similar a few years ago that did not do all that. This time after returning two of these, I went with a beautiful quilted one that is a couple dollars more but a million times better.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF Mattress reeks of urine.
customer_reviews.text: I believed all the reviews and purchased this for our daughters bed when we got her brand new twin mattress. It was on the mattress since the beginning. I followed the washing and drying instructions perfectly every single time so it never got too hot or anything. Am changing her sheets today after an accident- was telling my husband how great it was that we had this protective cover. Well, not all the sheets and the cover are off the bed- and it REEKS of urine!!!! It did not protect the mattress, the urine just soaked through. Don't be fooled, I don't know how they have all these reviews that say it is a waterproof mattress protector. It is not!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if you care about your mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to protect our brand new queen size mattress from our 2 year old wetting the bed. First time he wet the bed since we got it the urine went right through and stained the new mattress. Couldn't be more frustrating. Now we'll return it, get the 20 something bucks back, and be left with our ruined new mattress with no recourse. Stay away. Get something else. I don't know what, but don't get this.
customer_reviews.author: questman77

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: So you see this mattress pad and you’re thinking “Oh this is great, it will be perfect to protect my kids’ mattress.” Purchase. Your kid has an accident at night and you’re like oh no biggie we will just change the sheets. PLOT TWIST- turns out the mattress pad you JUST purchased because it said it was waterproof turns out to be not waterproof or pee proof at all and your kids mattress now has a massive pee stain. Total waste of money. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Nordyke

customer_reviews.title: Leaked Urine - NOT Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover on July 25th. Started starting using August 1. We've washed it about 10x times. We are trying no pull-up with our 5 yr old at night. Last night there was an accident and urine had leaked through onto the mattress, very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Rush

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these under the assumption that they are waterproof like the description claims. Let me tell you they are NOT. My potty training 3 year old boy peed through his pull up and it went through this and SOAKED his brand new mattress. The smell is awful and I'm so upset that these don't work like they claim to! Now we have a ruined mattress 😤 Had he been wearing underwear there would have been a LOT more pee on the mattress since these are not waterproof. I will not be buying this product again and advise others not to buy...it's worthless. Now I need to spend more money trying to find something that actually IS waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: STAINED & LOUD
customer_reviews.text: I hated this product. I returned it as soon as I opened it and tried to put it on my brand new mattress. 1) it was LOUD and make the most unpleasant sound... why would anyone want to sound like they're sleeping on a tarp? I got a memory foam mattress so I could feel softness and hear nothing when I move around! 2) it arrived with YELLOW STAINS..... How disgusting!!! Even though it's very faint in the picture, it was obvious enough for me to immediately notice it and rip it off my bed. I'm super disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Chou

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect the mattress in our motel room for our vacation at the beach for a week. I have a 4 year old that is potty trained but still has occasional accidents at night. He did great all week until our last night there. He wet the bed. It soaked through the mattress protector all the way to the mattress! Not waterproof! The bed would’ve been better protected by layering towels on the bed. I woke up and freaked out because the mattress was wet AFTER I purchased this protector for THIS VERY REASON!! Would not recommend this if you’re really looking for a waterproof mattress protector :(
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: If you want Smooth Cotton & not Terry Cloth like a Towel - make sure you select the proper material!
customer_reviews.text: The ones I received were Terry Cloth - I was in a hurry, and this was My fault as I did not read the description properly. Terry Cloth material, for bedding? To me that is just gross. Terry Cloth grabs lint when washing and drying, and just in general, and would be extremely warm as a base for sleeping. I don't want to or have time to use a lint roller for a mattress protector for goodness sake! I returned these & got smooth cotton ones. So read the descriptions carefully, and watch out and order properly! Also these don't flat out say Terry Cloth, they say "Terry Cotton." These are Terry Cloth like a bath towel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are still like brand new
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these mattress protectors. Two full size and two king size. I've had the two full size over a year. I wash and dry them almost every week. They are still like brand new. They really do hold a lot of liquid, they do not make you hot, or make the plasticity sound when you move. Two of my boys needed king size so I ordered them one each. No complaints from them so far so they must be good! I would recommend and when I need more I'll come back. Also my three sons have allergies, and even though it's still there, it was worse. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Completely leak proof
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattress cover. We have a 4 year old and a newborn and this has saved our bed from spills, potty training, diaper changes, and everything in between. Most recently, an entire water bottle was spilled and the quilt, sheets, and blankets were soaked and the mattress was completely dry. It’s lightweight, easy to clean in the washer and dryer, and (most importantly) it doesn’t have a crinkly, plastic sound or feel. We have these covers on every bed in our house and they have held up!
customer_reviews.author: MommaLazer

customer_reviews.title: 😍Like sleeping on a diaper
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Purple mattress and wanted to protect it so I tried this mattress cover. I wouldn't recommend it. It's a moderately rough cloth and moderately noisy, and it takes away noticeable feeling from normally pillowy-soft top of the mattress. I've been testing it by peeling off half of it under the sheets and laying on the diaper side vs the mattress side, and I dislike the feeling of laying on top of this protector. I'm sure the mattress protecting aspect of this is fine. It's just not great to sleep on. A lot of glowing reviews are people who installed it for their kids or guest rooms, not people who use it on their primary mattress.
customer_reviews.author: tim tom

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: It appears water resistant, which is the main reason why I purchased it. It does not have the noise from sleeping on a plastic cover which is good. Unfortunately, I spend my nights moving from spot to spot as it appears the temperature of the mattress/sheet has increased. Because of the material, perspiration does not stay for an extended period before it appears to have evaporated. One has to weigh the good against the bad and decide which aspect means more
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested: Failed straight out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: Did not waterproof at all upon first use. I bought precautionary measures (incontinence bed pads) as well to protect the mattress (just in case, because I had tried what feels like every “waterproof mattress protector” out there. This isn’t it. I laid down the incontinence pads between this protector and the mattress. These are straight out of the bag, unwashed, not dried. Guess what? Urine leaked right through, and the pads underneath smelled of and stained with urine. Thank goodness I thought to invest in RMS incontinence pads.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: love it, washed before use as recommended and fit the bed perfectly over my 3" memory/gel foam topper i have on top of my mattress. there is no "crinkle" noise like on other liners i have used and it is soft and cant even tell its there. i havent had any spills or messes yet (thankfully) but it has the membrane lining so i am sure it would do the job its supposed to do if something happens. i recommend getting this protector if your looking for the added insurance of protecting your mattress but still want comfort.
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Won't Stay On
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof mattress protector will not stay on and has not been washed or dried yet. I bought the queen size for my queen mattress and it is too short and narrow to stay on the mattress securely all night. I read many reviews and hoped it would fit, but it works off one corner or the other during the night. I'm ordering one today made by a name brand mattress company and hope it will fit good and stay on. My previous mattress protector fit great but shrunk so much it wouldn't stay on after being washed and dried twice. Hope the third time is a charm.
customer_reviews.author: ChiChi

customer_reviews.title: Very Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I slept on our new mattress a few days prior to adding this protector. The mattress is a cross over model of springs on the bottom with a foam topper. The mattress really hugged my body and was very comfortable before putting the protector on. The protector is not noisy like I saw in other brand reviews but it did take some of the comfort out because the mattress doesn't quite form to our bodies as it used to. I was happy with the seller communication after I ordered the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Sweat Pool
customer_reviews.text: Do you like waking up in a pool of sweat? If so, this product is for you! If not, you should avoid buying. We purchased this after getting a new bed. We slept in the new bed comfortably for a week. We have AC and the house was the same temperature every night. We purchased this product and woke up sweaty two nights in a row. The house was at the same temperature as before. We even tried turning it 3-4 degrees cooler but still woke up sweaty! I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: stephen Sanger

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nicely Over Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I have a 3 year old and a new, expensive mattress that I want to protect. The material isn't very thick but it claims to be waterproof and it seems to be made out of the same type of material as the changing pads that I bought for our nursery changing table, so I believe them. It fit over our mattress nicely and doesn't cause any problems with a fitted sheet fitting on top of it. It feels like a very thin towel, but I can't feel it at all through the sheet. If it saves my mattress, it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Came with stains
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews, my sheets already came stained. I had a bunch of little red stains all over like dried blood or rust. Gross, right? The fabric is soft, however. So if your sheets happen to come clean and unused, then yeah, sure, I'd recommend this product. Otherwise, I'd suggest you find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Colin

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Washed and dried per manufacturers recommendations and it has so far been waterproof! My son sometimes has his diaper leak, so this is a life saver. It even protected against cat urine! We bought one in December that turned out to not be water proof at all, and I spent hours trying to save his mattress. So I was very skeptical when buying and using this, as we've been let down before. But, I'm very happy. We will be buying one for our king size bed, as well. Now, if only they could make a couch cover, we would be over the moon!
customer_reviews.author: Kaja S

customer_reviews.title: Small rustle
customer_reviews.text: This does have a bit of a rustle sound like others have noted. Honestly I only noticed it the first day because I was aware of it from the reviews but I didn't tell my husband and he's never said anything about it bothering him and he's a light sleeper. Over very pleased. I put 4* due to the rustle. Don't want to be misleading
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a very expensive organic mattress for the first time in my life and I wanted a mattress cover that would not ruin the experience of the new mattress. I did some research and read many reviews and am glad I chose this brand. It is thin, not puffy and baggy like most types and very strong. It doesn't smell like chemicals and doesn't make crunchy or other annoying noises that other mattress pads make. It fits my bed like a glove and doesn't bunch up or move around. It is a good product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It isn't liquid proof and does not protect mattress
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the picture, it did not protect my son's mattress at all. This was a leaky cup of either juice or tea (he's little and still carries sippy cups around and sometimes lays them down and forgets, so this was laying in his bed for several hours). Goodbye $650 mattress. The mattress was covered first with the cover I'm reviewing here, then we had a thicker mattress pad over that, then a regular fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: E. Slipsager

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and confidence
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with a 12 inch queen sized mattress and it fit perfectly. It has a lot of fabric underneath and good elastic to get a good snug fit. It doesn't make noise or change the texture of the bed noticeably. I hardly notice that it's there, but I'm happy to have the added protection in case I revert to childhood embarrassments or spill my drink that I definitely promised myself I wouldn't drink in my new bed. Perhaps this added confidence is to blame for my lack of self discipline.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael Baker

customer_reviews.title: The outer side appears like a low knap terry cloth
customer_reviews.text: This protector is fairly thin. The outer side appears like a low knap terry cloth, the underside is very shiny and plastic in appearance. If you are looking for something that allows airflow or cooling you probably want a thicker (and more expensive) mattress protector. Despite all that I have not found that this makes the bed feel warmer nor does it seem to retain body heat. There is no plastic feel and it is completely silent with no crackling sound. The elastic runs the entire perimeter so it stays on the mattress well. I have not washed it yet so I cannot comment on other reviews that state it takes awhile in the dryer. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Myronnabq

customer_reviews.title: 100% dry mattress during/after toddler bed-wetting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our queen sized guest bed, which is also used occasionally by our toddler grandson who is potty training. Obviously we don’t want to ruin the mattress, so this is a great choice and it did totally keep the mattress 100% dry after 2 overnight bed-wettings, so overall, I’m very happy with the product. I also wanted to use it for guests, which brings me to my only complaint: it does have a more plastic/nylon/vinyl/whatever backside than I had expected and I’m not sure it’s as comfortable for adult guests for that reason, but I have no guest feedback yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It was a perfect fit for my Ikea queen size bed which means ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the strength of two Twin XL protectors that I bought a while back. It was a perfect fit for my Ikea queen size bed which means little chance of wrinkling under the sheets unless the elastic edges came to be untucked through excessive movement. The top of the protector is a nice, soft towling which does not rustle at all. Out of the box, there were no odours that I could tell although I did wash before putting on the bed in any case. It's waterproofness hasn't been tested yet but, at a minimum, it'll keep the matress dust free.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable protection
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our camping trailer both to protect the mattress and hold the mattress and topper together. We didn't even notice it is there, not crunchy at all. It is plenty deep enough for a 8" mattress and 2" topper. We haven't tested the waterproof capability and hopefully will not have to. Our little guy may have other plans but not yet :)
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof or urine proof
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this mattress pad. We purchased it in April 2019 and it worked the first few time my then 3 year old had an accident in our bed. However recently he came into our room in the middle of the night and peed our bed. We change the sheets and everything immediately and my mattress was soaked in urine. I'm severely disappointed that this did not last like it claims it will.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot, Sweaty & Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: It may be waterproof but the "terry cloth" top is paper thin and is torture to sleep on! I wanted a waterproof one to protect my new top buck mattress... but what good is a new mattress if you can't even sleep on it?!! It slides around, does make slight noise and is hot as H! I am going back to an all cotton mattress pad, I don't need 100% waterproof I'm not incontinent and don't drink in bed! When they advertise this as not hot to sleep on, don't believe it! This cover needs to be waterproof due to all the sweating it causes!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 3 of these ( 2 queen and one full). Do not listen to the bad reviews, this is a great mattress cover. It is not noisy at all, it’s very water proof (trust me, I dumped an entire glass of water and no issues), and it washes very well. Also, a very important thing, it holds up very well. My first one was purchased over a year ago and it still looks amazing, after washing and drying it many times. My son had a few accidents and I had no issues with leaks, washing or smells. I loved it so much, I bought 2 extra ones to take to my house in Europe. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this mattress protector for a few days, but it's so loud I had to take it off. Whether or not it does a decent job of protecting the mattress doesn't matter to me when it wakes me up whenever I move. It's like a thin tarp with a slightly rough topping that I assume was someone's idea of soft or at least absorbent (and maybe it is?) but I could feel it through the sheets, and for me, the underlying texture was enough to negate the softness of the sheets themselves. Keeping your mattress safe and clean is important. But so is being able to actually sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect against cat pee. Lasted one day.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately.. it does not protect against cat urine. We had this one top of our mattress and then actually had ANOTHER (different brand) mattress protector on top of this one so we double layered our mattress because our cat continuously likes to pee on the bed and the current protector we had was losing its integrity and the urine was soaking through. It’s so frustrating so we figured that if we put this one underneath, it would help. It did not. The pee soaked through our top layer AND THROUGH THIS ONE.. and into our mattress underneath. So unfortunate.. I would leave one star but I added two stars because the fit was good and it is soft.
customer_reviews.author: ramannoodles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Washed per instructions prior to using, have used this for a few days, and we are dissatisfied. It’s about 4” larger than our mattress (king size Leesa) and because of the cheap terry material across the top, our sheets stick to the protector, and these two layers slide all over the mattress. I now have to find an alternate product as this isn’t going to work long term. Triple check the product dimensions and your mattress size, as they can vary and you will have this problem unless it is an exact match. Also be warned of the terry material across the top of this protector, your sheets will cling to it.
customer_reviews.author: LNicky83

customer_reviews.title: Thin. Like, way thin. Like a Kleenex over a shower curtain.
customer_reviews.text: It's a VERY thin layer of material over what resembles a shower curtain. It fits the bed fine, but I have zero confidence that the thin material on the corners will last very long. I need to buy another for another bed, but will be looking at something else.
customer_reviews.author: DWC

customer_reviews.title: These are THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I adore these mattress protectors! We've bought a second set for each of our toddler's beds and we have a king sized one for ours. It doesn't crinkle and make a ton of noise like most, you wouldn't even know it's waterproof until it saves your mattress from a disaster of biblical proportions. I have a potty training 4 year old and a 2 year old that thinks nudity in the middle of the night is the best thing ever. I'm not exaggerating when I say I absolutely would have had to throw away at least one mattress if not for this protector. You NEED this in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Painahimah

customer_reviews.title: Not for potty training
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for 2 years and it is no longer waterproof. It failed last night when our kid wet the bed. I tumble dry this on low or air dry. Now our mattress is ruined! Not impressed with this product does not last.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested, Parent approved
customer_reviews.text: Top line: This cover works, period. Great value and performs flawlessly. Good: Being somewhat thin out of the box, I feared this mattress would be merely water "resistant", not "proof". After several thorough tests by my toddler, I can report my fears totally unfounded. Also excellent is the comfort level, that is to say it is undetectable in both feel and sound. Bad: The elastic on the cover is a bit chintzy. Other: This is not a wraparound cover--no zipper! Leaks from the side (or underneath??) may not be protected.
customer_reviews.author: ZDFTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had read some of the negative reviews...
customer_reviews.text: Like others who left poor reviews, I bought this mattress pad because of the huge number of positive reviews. Now I know they must have paid for fake 5-star reviews. This is basically worthless if you are worried about a toddler or pet wetting the bed. It is NOT waterproof at all. After the first accident, we gave the protector the benefit of the doubt since the urine sat on it for several hours. Last night, our toddler wet the bed again, but we caught it right as it was happening. Sure enough, the mattress was soaked underneath. Not even going to bother washing it this time, it's going right in the trash. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thielman

customer_reviews.title: Good pad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good pad for the price but it will split after a few washings on the underside. No big deal really because the top holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect against stains
customer_reviews.text: While this product is a nice fit, it is "noisy" and does not protect against stains. You can hear the material underneath you when moving in the bed, so we added an additional layer of a standard mattress pad and that seemed to help with the noise. However, it is NOT waterproof and will not protect against stains. Our child is still potty training, and soaked through the top sheet, mattress pad, and this "waterproof protection" layer and I can still see stains on the mattress. If your mattress warranty is dependent upon keeping stains off the mattress, as so many require, I suggest finding a different brand/product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT waterproof. My son wet the bed and it soaked right through to the brand new mattress. So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Druberri40

customer_reviews.title: Not odor proof
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to protect our new 1,600.00 mattress. Our cat sometimes has accidents and we wanted to make sure the mattress was protected. Within a 2 week period after the protector was on, our cat urinated on our bed and I discovered that the urine did not penetrate the pad, the odor did. There is a horrible cat urine odor on our mattress. Very disappointed!! Must now remove odor from mattress if we can.
customer_reviews.author: David L Haslam

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it! Beware it leaks! My mattress ruined, toddler wet the bed and it did not hold up. I bought it over the summer and have washed it a few times. PLEASE DON'T BUY. I have asked the seller directly on how to go about getting a replacement no response.
customer_reviews.author: Anomg

customer_reviews.title: rip off
customer_reviews.text: This bills itself as a mattress protector, including from dust mites. It might be a waterproof top, but it is essentially a mattress pad, and in no way protects the mattress from dust mites. Also, please note the accelerated return window, leaving me stuck with an inferior product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Planetary Drive

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof/urine proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my cat sometimes pees on my bed. It specifically states it's waterproof and resists urine. Well, my cat peed on my bed and it soaked straight through this to the mattress (through several thick layers, so it's not like it was directly on this cover). Not worth the money if it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Devin H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but beware the sides aren't waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My main problem with this product is that the sides aren't waterproof. I've had 2 incidents now of my 4 year old wetting the bed while he was sleeping near the edge of the bed, and the liquid ran off the top and over the side and soaked into side of the mattress. The top surface of the protector seems waterproof, but it's not absorbent enough to absorb all the liguid so it runs down the side, getting into the side and soaking the mattress. The top surface is nice and soft and probably waterproof enough, but this product would be much better if the sides were waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: dancyr

product_meta.title: SafeRest Twin Size Premium Hypoallergenic Waterproof Mattress Protector - Vinyl Free
product_meta.description:
Size:Twin

SafeRest Premium Mattress Protectors Provide Undetectable Protection for You and Your Family

Protects against allergens, dust mites, bacteria, perspiration, urine and fluids
SafeRest Premium Mattress Protectors offer protection against dust mites, fluids, urine, perspiration and allergens making them especially helpful for those with kids, pets, allergies or incontinence. As we sleep we shed thousands of dead skin cells, which can quickly accumulate providing an ideal environment for dust mites. SafeRest mattress protectors trap dust mites, allergens and skin cells on the surface of the protector where they can be easily washed away during suggested quarterly launderings. This helps provide a cleaner more allergen free sleep environment for you and your family.

Soft Cotton Terry Surface - Breathable, Cool and Noiseless
To keep our protectors cool and noiseless, the surface material is made with soft cotton terry back coated with a breathable, hypoallergenic and 100% waterproof membrane layer. Cotton terry naturally absorbs moisture and is completely noiseless.

Fitted Sheet Style
To ensure a great fit, an elastic band is used on the side skirt to automatically pull excess material under the mattress.

Machine Washable
Machine-wash with your sheets using normal household detergents that do not contain bleach. Tumble dry on low heat. Do not iron.

SafeRest Invisa-Shield™
Our mattress protectors will not change the feel of your mattress. This is great for those with any type of mattress including innerspring, latex or memory foam.

All SafeRest premium protectors are backed by a full replacement 10-year product warranty, contain no phthalates, vinyl or PVCs and are registered as a class 1 medical device with the FDA.
feature_bullets: Protects Against Dust Mites, Fluids, Urine, Perspiration, Allergens And Bacteria (10-Year Warranty)
Hypoallergenic Cotton Terry Surface With Membrane Back Coating (Waterproof, Noiseless and Breathable)
Great For Those With Kids, Pets, Allergies, Asthma, Eczema Or Incontinence (OEKO-TEX Certified SH025 151792)
Will Not Change The Feel of Your Mattress (Registered with the FDA as a Class 1 Medical Device)
Fitted Sheet Style Design - Twin Size Mattress Protector 39" x 75" - Fits up to 14" deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars83,607 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
